Package VIEW

Class GameInterface

java.lang.Object
VIEW.GameInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, viewListeners
public class GameInterface extends Object implements Runnable, viewListeners
Class that represents the textual user interface.

  • Method Details

    • firstRun

      public String firstRun()
      Retrieves the nickname insert by the player.
      Returns:
      The nickname insert by the user from the standard input.

    • numberOfPlayers

      public int numberOfPlayers()
      Retrieves the number of players that are playing insert by the first player.
      Returns:
      The number of players insert by the user from standard input.

    • playing

      public void playing() throws RemoteException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException
      Starts the two main phases of the turn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - If the user selects not adjacent slots.
      NotCatchableException - If the user selects one (or more) not catchable slots.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - If the user wants to select too much slots (according to the space in his shelf and the slot's configuration on the dashboard).

    • playerInsert

      public void playerInsert() throws NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, RemoteException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Insertion of the selected tiles into the shelf in the column chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • displayDashboard

      public void displayDashboard(Dashboard board)
      Prints the dashboard on screen.
      Parameters:
      board - The dashboard to print.

    • displayPersonalShelf

      public void displayPersonalShelf(PersonalShelf shelf)
      Prints the user's personal shelf on screen.
      Parameters:
      shelf - The personal shelf to print.

      public void displayPersonalGoal(PersonalGoal pGoal)
      Prints the user's personal goal on screen.
      Parameters:
      pGoal - The personal goal to print.

      Notifies the user with the ranking and the winner of the match.
      Parameters:
      winner - The ranking and the winner of the match.

      public void notifyAlmostOver()
      Prints a message on the standard output to inform that at the end of the lap the game will be over.

    • notifySelectedCoordinates

      public void notifySelectedCoordinates(SlotChoice[] SC) throws RemoteException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException
      Method that notify to the listeners about the tiles selected by the player.
      Specified by:
      notifySelectedCoordinates in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      SC - Object that contains the coordinates of the selected tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • notifyOrder

      public void notifyOrder(OrderChoice o)
      Notifies Method that notify to the listeners about the order chosen by the player for the insert.
      Specified by:
      notifyOrder in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      o - Object that contains the order of the tiles for the insert.

    • notifyInsert

      public void notifyInsert(int column) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies to the listeners about the column chosen by the player for the insert.
      Specified by:
      notifyInsert in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      column - The column where the player wants to put the tiles in.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • notifyOneMoreTime

      public void notifyOneMoreTime() throws RemoteException, SameNicknameException
      Notifies to the listeners if a player want to try another time to enter the game with a different nickname (he tried before to enter the game with a nickname already taken)
      Specified by:
      notifyOneMoreTime in interface viewListeners
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      SameNicknameException - Exception thrown if the nickname chosen by the player.

    • notifyChoices

      public void notifyChoices(int number) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Notifies to the listeners about the number of tiles selected by the player.
      Specified by:
      notifyChoices in interface viewListeners
      Parameters:
      number - The number of tiles selected by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • displayCommonGoal

      public void displayCommonGoal(GameView gameView)
      Prints the two common goals on screen.
      Parameters:
      gameView - The game view to obtain the common goals.

    • errorNick

      public void errorNick(String message) throws SameNicknameException, RemoteException
      Asks for the reinsertion of the nickname.
      Parameters:
      message - The text message printed on the standard output.
      Throws:
      SameNicknameException - If a player choices a nickname already in use.
      RemoteException - If a communication error occurs during the remote operation.
